channel.title: Below the Surface
channel.description: Scuba diving stories and skills: safety, marine life, travel, and calm thinking underwater.
channel.itunes:author: Rina Okafor

item.title: Episode 1: Wreck Diving Fundamentals (with Marco Silva)
item.description: Marco Silva shares planning, lines, lights, and how to avoid “task loading” when the visibility drops.

item.title: Episode 2: Marine Biology for Divers (with Hanna de Wit)
item.description: What divers often misidentify, how reefs recover, and how to be a better observer without touching anything.

item.title: Episode 3: Calm Under Pressure (with Owen Chen)
item.description: A longer training-style chat: gas planning, buoyancy drills, navigation, and decision-making when a dive doesn’t go to plan.
